10 ХОРОВОДОВ ИЗ 10

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical game that will have you either really hooked or make you uninstall in a few games.

Your main goal as a survival is to repair 5 generators that are placed around various maps while a killer(controlled by someone else, mind you) is going around trying to stop you and sacrifice you to the entity by any means.

The main thing i love about this game is playing with friends and having solid communication like call outs of what the killer is doing and trying to coordinate tactical moves. Every now and then, some funny blunders happen and we all end up dying for doing something stupid.

If you love a challenge, playing killer definitely offers a good mix of challenging yet rewarding game play in which you can outplay 4 other individuals in their attempt at escaping you.

The characters are for the most part a joy to look at, though i wish every character felt more unique aside from the cosmetics you can get for them. A traditional class system for the characters or their skills only tied to them like the killers would make for some interesting game play and balancing, but what the game offers currently is totally fine.

Overall, the game is great and i highly recommend, especially if youre a fan of classic horror slasher movies and whatnot.

The only downside for me is the community. Not as a whole, but you will your fair share of people you wished you never stumbled upon.

8/10

Dead by Daylight isn't a perfect game, but it IS an extremely fun game, especially if you're playing with friends.  You may not like the play-style that some players employ, but that's to be expected with any multiplayer online game.  Just move on to the next round.  The recent addition of the in game store was brilliant, I just wish that the skins were a little cheaper.

Also, the Twitch community for this game is fantastic and worth checking out if you don't already.  I have spent more hours lurking/hanging out in DBD streams than I have played in the game, and I've met a lot of really awesome folks.  This game is addicting.

GLHF, see ya in the fog.

The game has potential, but the developers prefer to release "skin collections" instead of fixing the whole game. In 2017, it was fun to play and there was an atmosphere - the game was better with a horror effect (even after 1000h of losses). Currently, the game is not a multiplayer horror game for me, and an ordinary game in which I play  out of sentiment for good old DBD. Lots of streamers, ytbers are leaving and I fully understand their. The game has not been developed for several months. Items and skins from events that took place in 2017/2018 are available to everyone, because the old player is on a par with the type, which will spend a lot of money on event skins in the game store.
I wish you a nice game to people who still want to play it and I feel sorry for the people who recently bought and cannot return her.🤝🏻
Take Memento mori out of the game and than I might actually rate this positely.

Recomiendo Dead by Daylight porque es un juego en el que debes ser estratégico tanto como superviviente y como asesino. A continuación describiré los aspectos positivos y negativos:
LO BUENO:
-Juego competitivo con sistema de rangos (de 20 a 1) e insignias( son cuatro dependiendo de si juegas como superviviente o asesino), perfecto para aquellos a los que les gusta exigirse a si mismos.
-Rituales diarios: son "misiones" que puedes cumplir para obtener puntos de sangre extra.
-Personalización de tu personaje. Los desarrolladores dieron ahora más opciones a la personalización con la nueva tienda en donde se pueden comprar cosméticos y personajes con fragmentos irisados o con auricells.
-Variedad de supervivientes y asesinos así como de mapas, objetos y accesorios.
-El juego te llena de adrenalina tanto si juegas como superviviente y como asesino. Por ejemplo, cuando vas escapando del asesino, cuando este pasa muy cerca de donde estás escondido y no te ve o cuando estás persiguiendo a un superviviente y solo piensas en atraparlo.
-Juego en constante actualización con nuevos contenidos.
-Con respecto a la tienda, los cosméticos y personajes que se pueden adquirir en ella se pueden hacer con fragmentos irisados (se consiguen dependiendo de la duración de cada partida) o con auricells ("monedas" que se obtienen comprando con dinero real).
LO MALO:
-Hay algunos asesinos camperos. Lo más gracioso es que algunos lo justifican: "si no quieren que campee no hagan gen rush", "si no quieres que campee no me hagas pallet loop", etc. Puede que en casos excepcionales como en el caso de que te toque jugar contra un supervivente que esté usando hacks esté justificado que lo campees o lo tunelees. Personalmente, considero que campear es una práctica sucia que arruina la experiencia del juego, la partida se torna aburrida.
-Supervivientes tóxicos que se creen OchiDo y sus amigos, usualmente forman parte de premades. Puedo dividirlos en dos partes: los que perjudican a sus compañeros y los que se "burlan" del asesino haciendo tbag. Los primeros harán cualquier cosa para hacerte la partida imposible como hacer ruido a propósito para que el asesino vaya a tu posición, hacerte bodyblock en lugares cerrados o peor aún, cuando el asesino te persigue, etc. Los segundos se pasarán toda la partida fastidiando al asesino y llamando su atención por cualquier medio, por lo general son los que hacen tbag luego de tirar un palé o cuando están en la puerta de salida. 
-Los rage quiters. Son los jugadores que se desconectan de la partida cuando van perdiendo. Como superviviente están los que se desconectan cuando fallaron la prueba del decisive strike o cuando los tumban y saben que ya van en su tercer cuelgue. Como asesino están los que se desconectan cuando no mataron a ningún superviviente, cuando le rompieron sus tótems de maleficio o en cualquier situación que consideren difícil. Mi consejo es que, si vas a desconectarte de la partida, que sea cuando de verdad lo necesites, no cuando te dé una rabieta porque vayas perdiendo.
-El juego sigue teniendo bugs aunque solo me he topado con uno en todas las veces que jugué, la mayoría de otros bugs los vi en videos o capturas.

En conclusión, recomiendo Dead by Daylight porque, aunque es un juego desequilibrado (4 vs 1), no deja de ser emocionante y mejor todavía si lo juegas con amigos. A pesar de algunos jugadores que contribuyen a empeorar la experiencia del juego, estos siempre van a existir. Lo que uno debe hacer es aprender a lidiar con ellosy seguir adelante.

I recommend this game to anyone who likes multiplayer horror games because its fun to play with friends or alone~

这款游戏真的超好玩的，从16年开始入手，原来真的超级火，因为这种独特的玩法吸引了许多人，虽然我也是个新人吧，但是我觉得这游戏比其他这种后来的游戏要好玩的多，从真实度方面就引人注目。又有恐怖的气氛带入感特别强。服务器不好是真的，有时候老会断线，并且匹配不上，但官方还是在尽最大的可能去修复，一些刚买的玩家说一直上不去老卡什么的，这些都是存在过的，有时候还会卡在主页面。但我选择了等待，因为我热爱这款游戏。他玩的时间可以和守望相匹配，我近期守望才玩的比较多，可见这个游戏的吸引力。然后我觉得可以弄个剧情模式等等类似于彩虹或者玩具熊等可以弄摄像头来看屠夫，能更加增加恐怖气氛。
  最后我想说：刚入手的玩家请多耐心玩一会，你会发现你玩的这个游戏越来越好玩，你一定不会后悔的
另外希望官方越做越好，多出新玩意。但不要忘记初心、
不推薦 ，遊戲中鬼或倖存者會開外掛提高跑素 ...伺服器的線路普遍偏爛玩一場好房要一直刷。

The game is extremely fun but can also be equally as stressful. I don't play very often so I'm usually in the lower ranks. As a killer, it's often that I am pair with 4 high ranked survivors, usually in a group with friends (which very well destroys the premise of the game)  Yeah, you'll get stomped, which isn't a problem. The players afterwards are a special type of toxic. You won't always get them but when you do, oh boy. Just turn off chat. If your profile is open too public comments, you can 100% expect people to go right to your profile and BM on you for whatever reason. 

I end up playing as survivor most of the time because being a killer is a coin flip on if you'll have fun or not. Which sucks because being a killer is where most of the fun is for me, at least.

而且游戏的配置要求非常低，我GTX750TI都能高画质流畅运行，真的良心啊这游戏。

Well, it's the best game I've ever played. 
Maybe "DBD" is something like "Friday the 13th", but it's much better, at least because there is no voice chat. 
Frankly I'm not going to compare the two games and explain completely why "DBD" is better, because it was Done By Others :) 
The first time I heard about this game was in 2015 when there was a demo-version, and I liked it so so much)). And finally in 2018 I was able to get this game for free and I wasn't disappointed in the deed at all. Free period I wasn't enough and I didn't spare the money in the end to buy DBD. 
Fortunately (for me), there's nothing I don't like in the game. It's gorgeous, 10/10.
